Generation IX.Scarlet: It likes playing with others of its kind using the water ring on its tail. It uses ultrasonic waves to sense the emotions of other living creatures.
Generation IX.Violet: Its water ring is made from seawater mixed with a sticky fluid that Finizen secretes from its blowhole.
